item.title: Mortgage rates fall for second straight week as shutdown, economic uncertainty weigh
item.description: The average rate on the 30-year fixed mortgage fell this week to 6.27%, according to the latest Freddie Mac data released on Thursday. That is down fr...

item.title: Bessent says government shutdown 'starting to cut into muscle' and economy may be losing billions per day

item.title: Trader Joe's accused of copying Smucker's Uncrustables sandwiches
item.description: The J.M. Smucker Co. filed a federal lawsuit in Ohio accusing Trader Joe's of copying its Uncrustables frozen sandwiches and violating trademarks.
